available through the last day of this month NBI INC SEMINARS ON CLEONLINECOM We are very pleased this month to welcome to CLEonlinecom another new CLE seminar sponsor NBI Inc We have entered into an agreement with NBI to produce a number of new online CLE seminars based on content from live CLE programs sponsored by NBI These new seminars will feature both audio and written materials from NBIs seminars NBI produces a wide variety of CLE seminars throughout the year in numerous states around the country Two of these new NBI seminars are available this month and many more will be offered on our site in the months to come If you have seen a flyer for an NBI seminar in your state that you would like to see online here at CLEonlinecom please let us know and we would be happy to pass this along to the folks at NBI NEW SEMINARS FOR THIS MONTH The following are brief descriptions of our new seminars for this month Full details on each are available on our Web site NBI Presents Practical Legal Ethics in Florida Issues and Answers This is the first of the new NBI seminars being offered on our site and it features an essential topic for all Florida practioners This timely online seminar will offer practical advice on everyday ethical issues avoiding inherent pitfalls in legal practice and how not to be the next case we read about The seminar features the audio and written materials from a live NBI seminar held in Florida earlier this year This seminar is accredited by the Florida Bar for hours of CLE NBI Presents Superior Deposition Strategies in Florida Civil Trial Practice Another of the new NBI seminars being offered this month is designed for Florida lawyers on the subject of depositions In this new seminar you will learn strategies used by veteran litigators to prepare your own client as well as how to take the deposition of the opposing party This seminar also features the audio and written materials from a live NBI seminar held in Florida in February of this year This seminar is accredited by the Florida Bar for hours of CLE including ethics Internet Legal Issues together with CCE Together with another of our regular CLE seminar partners the Center for Continuing Education CCE in California we are pleased to present this new online CLE seminar which is designed to review and discuss three evolving areas that are vitally important for attorneys with clients doing business on the Internet This seminar features a streaming video program from a live CLE seminar on this topic that was originally conducted in California by CCE that features Prof Marc Greenberg who is a Visiting Professor and Founding Director of the Intellectual Property Law Program at Golden Gate University Law School in San Francisco This seminar is accredited for hours of CLE credit Corporate Counsel Wrongful Discharge Claims Ethics Policy and Practice ETHICS Continuing to add to his outstanding collection of ethics seminars on CLEonlinecom attorney David Hricik of Austin has prepared this new legal ethics seminar designed for attorneys who serve as inhouse counsel Whether inhouse counsel who have been wrongfully discharged should have a cause of action against their employer presents an interesting issue that has divided the courts and commentators This seminar will review this issue and provide insight into various values recognized by the courts that are important to inhouse practice This seminar is accredited for hour of CLE credit all in the area of legal ethics Thanks again for your continued interest in and support of CLEonlinecom We greatly value you as a registered user of our service and we would very much appreciate it if you could please spread the word about our awardwinning CLE site to other attorneys in your firm company or local area Best Regards Mike De La Rosa Esq Michael De La Rosa CEO Voice FAX CLEonlinecom PO Box Round Rock TX delivering CLE to YOUR desktop LEonlinecom
